title: Azure Administrator Associate (AZ-104)
subtitle: Master Azure Administration Skills
description: Master Azure administration skills for managing cloud infrastructure and resources
overview: This intensive Azure Administrator Associate training prepares you for the AZ-104 certification exam. Learn to manage Azure subscriptions, secure identities, administer infrastructure, configure virtual networking, and ensure business continuity through comprehensive hands-on labs.

learningObjectives.title: Identity and Governance
learningObjectives.description: Manage Azure AD, RBAC, policies, and resource organization

learningObjectives.title: Storage Solutions
learningObjectives.description: Configure storage accounts, implement data protection and disaster recovery

learningObjectives.title: Compute Resources
learningObjectives.description: Deploy and manage VMs, containers, and App Services

learningObjectives.title: Virtual Networking
learningObjectives.description: Implement VNets, load balancers, and hybrid connectivity

learningObjectives.title: Monitoring and Backup
learningObjectives.description: Configure monitoring, alerting, and backup solutions

modules.title: Manage Azure Identities and Governance
modules.description: Azure Active Directory, users, groups, RBAC, and Azure Policy implementation

modules.title: Implement and Manage Storage
modules.description: Storage accounts, blob storage, file shares, and data protection strategies

modules.title: Deploy and Manage Azure Compute Resources
modules.description: Virtual machines, containers, App Services, and scaling strategies
topics: Container services and Azure Container Instances

modules.title: Configure and Manage Virtual Networking
modules.description: VNets, subnets, routing, load balancing, and hybrid connectivity
topics: Hybrid connectivity with VPN and ExpressRoute

modules.title: Monitor and Back Up Azure Resources
modules.description: Azure Monitor, Log Analytics, backup solutions, and disaster recovery

handsOnLabs.title: Setting up Azure AD and implementing RBAC
handsOnLabs.description: Practical implementation of identity and access management

handsOnLabs.title: Deploying and configuring virtual machines
handsOnLabs.description: Complete VM lifecycle management and configuration

handsOnLabs.title: Creating and managing storage solutions
handsOnLabs.description: Storage account setup, blob management, and backup configuration

handsOnLabs.title: Implementing virtual networking and hybrid connectivity
handsOnLabs.description: VNet creation, peering, and VPN gateway configuration

handsOnLabs.title: Configuring monitoring and backup strategies
handsOnLabs.description: Azure Monitor setup, alerting, and backup implementation

prerequisites: Experience with PowerShell or Azure CLI

instructor.name: Yaïr Knijn
instructor.title: Principal Cloud Architect & Engineer
instructor.bio: Expert Azure trainer with 10+ years of cloud infrastructure experience

personalStory.story: Managing Azure at enterprise scale requires more than just technical knowledge—it requires battle-tested strategies. I've managed Azure environments for organizations with thousands of users, and I've learned what works and what doesn't. In this training, I share the real-world administrative patterns that have saved countless hours and prevented critical issues.
